description: Please read the ad before you apply.  We need a social media assistant -- someone who knows the ins and outs of LinkedIn, Facebook, Instagram, Mailchimp and so forth.  Your qualifications are that you can show that care about our mission and that you know how to do this work.  Your duties will include (a) posting content provided to you for these sites; (b) posting additional content to sites; (c) increasing followers, (c) using your intelligence to advise us as needed about how to improve our social media presence.  Please send us a cover letter and a resume.
